description: Allowlist for known false positives in Docker Scout vulnerability scans
documentation: Add CVEs here that are confirmed false positives due to version detection issues or nested dependencies

entries.reason: Example entry - False positive due to version mismatch in nested dependency

global_ignores.description: Packages or CVE patterns to always ignore

false_positive_causes: Version detection from SBOM doesn't match actual installed version
Package detected from a nested/vendored dependency that is not actually used
Language-specific package manager reports different version than system package
Base image layer contains old version but app layer overwrites with newer version
verification_steps: 1. Run container and check actual installed version with package manager
2. Verify the vulnerable code path is actually reachable
3. Check if the package is in a layer that is overwritten
4. Confirm with upstream maintainers if uncertain
